name: NetAlertX
description: Network intruder and presence detector. Scans for devices connected to your network and alerts you if new and unknown devices are found. Features include device discovery via arp-scan, Pi-hole integration, SNMP router import, and notifications to 80+ services.

notes.text: NetAlertX will be available on port 20211 after installation.
For best results, the container should have network access to scan your LAN. Consider using host network mode for full ARP scanning capabilities.
